resources.string: Server is down please contact your inventory manager.
Some error occured please contact your inventory manager.
Network Not Avaliable please contact your inventory manager.
Due to Unavailability of network we are unable to authenticate you . Please contact your invetory amanger for further Assistance.
Master username or password you entered is incorrect.
Device is to get unlocked in few seconds . You will be given window of 30 min to enable network and logout from Inventory app home screen. \n After 30 min device will automatically get locked.
